# API Reference for cdktf.ITokenResolver

   ITokenResolver <a name="ITokenResolver" id="cdktf.ITokenResolver"></a>
  
  - *Implemented By:* <a href="#cdktf.DefaultTokenResolver">DefaultTokenResolver</a>, <a href="#cdktf.ITokenResolver">ITokenResolver</a>
  
  How to resolve tokens.
  
  # Methods <a name="Methods" id="Methods"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ITokenResolver.resolveList">ResolveList</a></code> | Resolve a tokenized list. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ITokenResolver.resolveMap">ResolveMap</a></code> | Resolve a tokenized map. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ITokenResolver.resolveNumberList">ResolveNumberList</a></code> | Resolve a tokenized number list. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ITokenResolver.resolveString">ResolveString</a></code> | Resolve a string with at least one stringified token in it. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ITokenResolver.resolveToken">ResolveToken</a></code> | Resolve a single token. |
  
  ---

  ## `ResolveString` <a name="ResolveString" id="cdktf.ITokenResolver.resolveString"></a>
  
  ```go
  func ResolveString(s TokenizedStringFragments, context IResolveContext) interface{}
  ```
  
  Resolve a string with at least one stringified token in it.
